attacks.attack_desc: Frightens the opponent
attacks.attack_message: You got spooked by hippie and a dog, losing 30hp

attacks.attack_desc: Throws snacks at the opponent
attacks.attack_message: You stopped to eat the scooby snacks, lost 10hp

attacks.attack_desc: Unmasks the ghost, forcing the opponent to avoid attacking the now revealed human
attacks.attack_message: You got side tracked by the gang,lose 20hp to avoid attacking the 'ghost'

attacks.attack_desc: Distracts the opponent with dumb clues
attacks.attack_message: You got distracted by the dumb clues left by the gang,losing 10hp

attacks.attack_desc: Laughs the opponent into self-doubt
attacks.attack_message: You got self-concious by the joker's laugh, making you lose 10hp

attacks.attack_desc: Create chaos to confuse the opponent
attacks.attack_message: You lost sight of the opponent in the chaos, losing 30hp

attacks.attack_desc: Manipulate the opponent with talks of anarchy
attacks.attack_message: You just lured into talks of betrayal and anarchy, losing 10hp

attacks.attack_desc: Fire the harpoon gun,which imaplaes the foes on impact
attacks.attack_message: You just got shot with the Joker's signature gun, losing 40hp

attacks.attack_desc: Call out the opponent for playing galaga
attacks.attack_message: You just got called out for playing galaga at work

attacks.attack_desc: Jarvis exposes the opponents weakness
attacks.attack_message: Jarvis analyzed your weaknesses, making the attack more powerful.

attacks.attack_desc: Shoot concentrated beams of negatively charged muons
attacks.attack_message: You just got blasted by the beams,losing 40hp

attacks.attack_desc: Arrogantly sass the opponent
attacks.attack_message: You just got sassed, losing your self-confidence and 10hp

attacks.attack_desc: Sings 'Let it go' on repeat
attacks.attack_message: You just lost 20hp listening to Elsa sing 'Let it go'

attacks.attack_desc: Ignore the opponent for upto 10 years
attacks.attack_message: You just got locked out of the fight, losing 30hp

attacks.attack_desc: Throw olaf at the opponent
attacks.attack_message: The cute talking snowman distracted you,making you lose 10hp

attacks.attack_desc: Force opponent to listen to the fact that you can't marry someone after knowing them for a day.
attacks.attack_message: You got a lecture about how you can't marry said man after knowing him for a day

attacks.attack_desc: Thanos tries to snap opponent, only to have it reversed
attacks.attack_message: Thanos tried to snap you,but it didn't work

attacks.attack_desc: Hurt your opponents ego by not aknowledging them
attacks.attack_message: You just got seen zone by Thanos

attacks.attack_desc: Attack the opponents love for Ironman by remembering he died
attacks.attack_message: You just got hit with the 'i am inevitable' moment

attacks.attack_desc: Everything should be equally balanced,so you didn't attack
attacks.attack_message: Equally balanced, like all things should be

attacks.attack_desc: Opponent loses 104 days of summer
attacks.attack_message: You just lost 104 days of summer

attacks.attack_desc: Candace calls mom on your opponent
attacks.attack_message: Candace finally gets validation, as her mom shouts at you

attacks.attack_desc: Platypus perry helps you attack the opponent
attacks.attack_message: You just got attacked by Agent Perry

attacks.attack_desc: Opponent gets blasted by Doofenshmirtz's inventions
attacks.attack_message: You just got blasted by some-weird-Inator
